about_the_game:
The port of San Francisco brings in a wide variety of merchandise from Asia and elsewhere, and some of it is of the more shady kind. Through Joy (a San Francisco native), the Payday Gang has a new smuggler contact, a former triad member named Jiu Feng, presenting them with the option to purchase a range of new weapons, mods and weapon colors.

The Jiu Feng Smuggler Pack includes a shotgun, an SMG and a pistol (with akimbo options for the latter two), along with 9 mods and 20 weapon colors.

New weapons

The following weapons are included in this DLC:
  • Mosconi 12G Tactical
  • AK Gen 21 Tactical (with akimbo option)
  • Crosskill Chunky Compact (with akimbo option)

New mods

The following mods are included in this DLC:
  • CE Extender
  • CE Rail Stabilizer
  • CE Muffler
  • BY90 Wide Suppressor
  • MG8 Precision Barrel
  • Bull Stock
  • Chunky Hunter Barrel
  • Crosskill Platinum Bull Slide
  • Crosskill Long Mag

New weapon colors

The following weapon colors are included in this DLC:
  • Skull Rose
  • Golden Luck
  • Psych Pattern Alpha
  • Deadbowz
  • Gem Jumble
  • Fingerprinted
  • Laugh on Black
  • Red Scales
  • Water Flower
  • Wallpaper Leaf
  • Tartan Punk
  • Monster Heart
  • Psych Pattern Beta
  • Red Carps
  • XoXo
  • Topography
  • Dagger Cross
  • Poker Face Dark
  • Ice Mosaic
  • 1983

Through Joy (a San Francisco native), the Payday Gang has a new smuggler contact, a former triad member named Jiu Feng, presenting them with the option to purchase a range of new weapons, mods and weapon colors.

short_description: The Payday Gang has a new contact in San Francisco for buying guns. The Jiu Feng Smuggler Pack includes a shotgun, an SMG and a pistol (with akimbo options for the latter two), along with 9 mods and 20 weapon colors.
